title: Tom Cruise has in his contract that you cannot look into his eye : Mira Nair
body_text:
‘Tom Cruise has in his contract that you cannot look into his eyes’: Mira Nair
Mira Nair and Shabana Azmi discussed the challenges of staying connected to reality as actors become more famous. Nair revealed that Tom Cruise has a contract stipulating that people cannot look him in the eye, which shocked Azmi. Nair and Azmi agree that remaining grounded is important for actors.
